Class bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal

  • java.lang.Object
    • bartMachine.Classifier

                • bartMachine.bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    bartMachine_g_mh

    public abstract class bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal
extends bartMachine_e_gibbs_base
    This portion of the code that performs the posterior sampling in the Gibbs sampler except for the Metropolis-Hastings tree search step
    Author:
    Adam Kapelner and Justin Bleich
